snippet: The Archdiocese of Los Angeles will pay $13 million to 17 people who say they were sexually abused by clergy members.
abstract: Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Los Angeles agrees to pay $13 million to 17 people who say they were sexually abused by clergy members.
lead_paragraph: The Archdiocese of Los Angeles will pay $13 million to 17 people who say they were sexually abused by clergy members.

headline.main: California: Church to Pay $13 Million in Abuse Cases
headline.print_headline: California: Church to Pay $13 Million in Abuse Cases
